featured.text: Dooley keeps Peanuts company while the adults in the family attend to Grandfather.

definition.zh_def: 花生，一種常見的豆類植物，通常用於食物或製作油。
definition.en_def: Peanuts are a type of legume that is commonly used as food or for making oil.
definition.example: I love snacking on roasted peanuts while watching a movie.
